articles.description: As Illinois enters the next phase of COVID-19 vaccinations, Chicago’s convention industry is cautiously planning a full slate of shows at McCormick Place for the second half of the year.

articles.author: Tom Westbrook, Thyagaraju Adinarayan, Jeff Lewis
articles.title: Silver swept up by GameStop retail frenzy, prices soar - Reuters India
articles.description: A social media-driven buying spree lifted silver to an eight-year high on Monday, though prices later pared gains on doubts about the ability of retail traders that have been focused on stocks to sway prices in the bigger, more liquid commodity.
